dialogue: I love you.
Love you.

Unmatched order, accuracy and efficiency....to transform warehouses into future ready opportunity centers....An increase in e-commerce and fast shipping expectations- in the face of real estate and labour shortages...
Because Hedda wants him to end his life courageously, romantically-
Your mother is busy with her company right now. So we need peace and quiet- It’s a scary time.
It’s not scary, it’s exciting!
I want to see you.
Look at me. Hey, hey look at me...
I want you to watch porn while you have sex with me.
What?
I want to-
Ok-
-feels weird.
You touch me.
No. Like this. You touch me.
Yes. Do it.
Come on- Do it-
You know I can’t- Like this.
It makes me feel like ...a villain.
Okay...okay.
Being a CEO is- being a collaborator- a nurturer. I see myself as a strategy expert but also- a human expert.

At the same time, one day shipping dramatically upped the stakes. The demand for what we do is huge. People are waiting for us to buckle under that pressure. The best thing to do is, smile and look up. Never show your weakness-
Scarlett doesn't understand Hedda Gabler at all - She thinks it’s about desire. It’s not about desire, It’s about suicide.
Hedda’s life is over before the play begins-
Right- Yes. Before it begins. It’s- over. That makes- a lot of sense- to me.
What are you mumbling about? You’re not saying any words- are you having a seizure?
You’re so rude-
Who are you texting the whole time?
When I’m on my phone it’s for work. Especially now -you know that.
As if that’s a good excuse! That’s the whole problem!
Hey, come here.
Am I-- relevant to you as a director?
Everyone is irrelevant. We don’t give enough attention to the avalanche that will cover us all, in a very short time.
What?
Romy, come on. Jesus-
You look beautiful, and we have this shot, but it’s not the style we are going for. It’s not what we agreed upon.
Let them wear what they want!
Go change please.
No.
It’s the one night I need you by my side.
I know. I’m so sorry. It’s just there is so much pressure now-
Come on. You can’t go.
Romy!
I really have to go. So sorry. Have fun. It was wonderful!
Hello?
You want to play a little bit?
Yeah-
Why did you do that?
I’ve never had an orgasm with you-
What?
Don’t fucking touch me-
I can’t- I can’t come with you.
Are you alright? Hey-
No-
Did you order the headphones for Isabel’s birthday?
Did you- Did you mean what you said? About never-
I was just taking it out on you- Of course I didn't mean it. That would be- Nineteen years of- I mean; no, I was angry. I was stressed. Of course I didn't mean it- I am sorry.
I- I’ve never- Normally, you know- Women- you know, they-
I’m not normal. I’m not other women! Look at me. I’m not normal.
No. You’re not.
Hi-
Yes?
Who is it?
Esme.
What’s going on? Are you ok?
I need to -
Ok.
I- Since I was very little, since I can remember even, I’ve always had these specific thoughts-
What thoughts?
Dark, dark thoughts-
Thoughts of -- violence. Revolting thoughts. Embarrassing. Of being -forced and hurt, and humiliated-
I was so ashamed- I still am. I have no idea where they come from, who planted them in my brain. I would give anything to erase them, to delete them-

I see myself as a strong, smart woman, who is...in control of things, who knows what she’s doing- Who is loving and caring and responsible, and who wants to work on herself. Not some kind of embarrassing-- masochist, or ignorant... weak anti feminist who-
What are you trying to say? I don’t understand.
I thought it was all connected to my childhood- So I tried to work through that. Every form of therapy- You know that. But it didn’t help. It doesn’t help. I was born with it.
What do you mean?
And I asked , my first -real boyfriend, Justin, if he could- you know- treat me that way, do something to me- but it disgusted him- he said. He thought it was cliche- Which it is! And with us-
I sometimes- tried to- But you never seem to be... into it.
Into what exactly?
I just want to be normal. I want to be normal- I want to be what you like. I want to be the woman you like-
I’m sorry, Romy, I don’t know what you mean- could you...be a little more specific-
What I’m saying is: I’ve never experienced any of them. Any of the- fantasies. In real life, until-
I met-
Until you met- ?
Who? Who did you meet?
Ehh- I-
Jesus. What happened?
What? Say something! Jesus Christ! Do I know him? Is it- is it Sebastian?
What? No. No!
Who?
What did you do? What?
No- it- It was a man- A stranger-
A stranger?
Somehow- he knew. He sensed-
What?
He knew.
What? He knew fucking what?
How to be- fearless- around me- or- I mean- And I couldn’t resist that.
How many times?
Once. Only once.
Who is this guy? Are you in love with him?
It was as if some sort of animal woke up inside me.
For me it’s not about a safe space and a safe word and consent and “the kink”- I hate that word.
Tell me what happened. Just tell me.
It has to be- There has to be a form of actual danger- Something needs to be at stake. For real. I know, it’s gross, it’s obscene- It’s a monster- that will destroy- anything to get-
So? What did you do? What did he do to you?
It’s over now. It was like an exorcism, and it’s done. It’s out of my system. It happened once.
I don’t need it anymore. It’s done.
My childhood didn't help. The radical beliefs of my parents. The communes- the lack of boundaries-
Oh! You see yourself as a victim? Your blaming this on your childhood?
No. Of course not. It’s not that-, It’s not an excuse. I was born with it.
I will never see him again. It happened once. I don’t even know his name.
I want you to leave. Now.
It has nothing to do with us. With the -real- me. With our family. I love you! Please- I’m over it. It’s out of me, out of my system.
What are you saying?
It has everything to do with you! There is no excuse for this! Not your mom, not your childhood! You fucking lied to me! To us!

Something needs to be at stake?? I don’t give a shit about your pathetic, banal sexual fantasies. It’s not about that! You jeopardized the most important thing... your children! You make me sick. Get the fuck out of my house! Now.
You have to leave. You have to go!
No. That doesn’t make it okay.
Please, give us a minute- Just leave us alone.
Come on, Romy. Come on- Just give me some time with him.
No. Jacob- Lets stay calm.
Jacob! No!
Stay back!
Stop! Jesus Christ.
You sat at my fucking table. You talked to my girls.
How long? How fucking long? You lied to me- you fucking lied to me!
I felt sorry for you!
Sit down.
She used you. You know that right? She abused you-
You think that’s intimacy?
